Text: Re CNG Parking DealIt depends when we pay the fee but if it is on the way out we would just make the commodity fee cents David Chris Germany AM To David CT Alicia CT Scott CT Angie NRON Dick CT cc Brenda H CT cc Scott NRON Victor CT Subject CNG Parking Deal These numbers will change a little but this is what we currently have in the system Parking in May dthtotal deal Taking out in June dthday deal Im not sure if the May numbers are net of fuel and we dont have an exact parking number for today as well David where do I show the parking fee We are paying times the total volume parked not the daily balance Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on AM Chris Germany PM To David CT Alicia CT Scott CT Angie NRON Dick CT cc Brenda H CT Subject CNG Parking Deal We are parking dthday for the thth on CNG deal and we are taking out dthday for the month of June deal ENA is paying CNG times the total volume parked Angie these volumes may go up I think Tenn is still trying to balance the weekend and they are a little long Clarissa will let you know

Re Local Production for JuneThe term ticket in TAGG is for d Where is the remaining volume so that the hedge ties David Chris Germany PM To John M NRON David CT Robert CT Dick CT Cyndie Balfour NRON Elizabeth L CT Molly CT Wade R CT cc Joan NRON Joann NRON Subject Local Production for June John I took the volumes on deal to for the term of the deal starting June This is the purchase from Belden Blake behind NYSEG I changed the volume on deal from dthday to dthday This is the purchase from StatOil at CPA The price on this deal is NX and the price on Johns worksheet is NX per MCF John is this price adjusted for dth I created deal purchase from StatOil volume of day the price is NX PER MCF This is a purchase of local production behind the citygate David this deal probably needs to be hedged in Sitara Cindy deal is a purchase from CES Statoil Energy I set up deal with the same counterparty This deal should have been in the system effective According to Elizabeth we should not use the CES StatOil Energy It doesnt matter to me how its set up however this deal should have been in the system from Jan and it is the same type of deal as deal I changed the volume on deal from dth to dthday This is a purchase from Questar and it is also local production behind CPA John there are deals for Questar the other deals have volumes of right now Can you tell me how the volume should be split out for pricing purposes Molly I created deal FOM priced sale to CES This deal will be matched with the CPA local production deals Let me know if anyone has any questions Thanks cg Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Angie NRON Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Cynthia NRON Meredith CT Molly CT cc Scott NRON John M NRON Dick CT Victor CT Wade R CT bcc Chris GermanyHOUECT Subject Local Production for June Please send this email to anyone that may need to see it Im sure I left someone out This is citygate gas ENA will sell to CES for June This will reduce the numbers on the sheet Doug sent us yesterday East Ohio Gas on CNG dth month from Power Gas Marketing CPA on TCO dthday from Power Gas Marketing dthday from StatOil dthday from Questa Note this is an estimated volume We should know the actual volume in the next day or so Note CES is not taking any Carnagie gas at CPA National Fuel dthday from Belden Blake The deal expires Equitrans All of the Equitrans is production or pool gas on the pipeline ENA nominates this gas CES still has a citygate load of dthday for June on Equitrans so the production gas will be delivered to CES CES will not be receiving any local production behind Peoples or NYSEG

Out of Office AutoReply Park City BoundI will be out of the office October th returning October th In my absence please contact Simon Thurbin
